chunk_text:
##### Pricing
$595 for two guests, with an additional $100 per extra guest. (Gourmet bites and sweets included)
### Custom Tour
For those seeking a personalized adventure, our Custom Tour option invites you to curate your own exploration of Oregon's renowned wine country. Guided by your unique preferences, we will design an itinerary with three winery stops. Include West Hills Vineyards as one of your stops, and enjoy a complimentary wine tasting.
